articles.author: Kasha Patel
articles.title: A solar storm hit Earth. Will the U.S. see aurora tonight? - The Washington Post
articles.description: The timing of the storm should provide a great show for Europe, but those in North America could also see the dazzling lights if the storm persists into nighttime.
articles.content: A solar storm hit Earth on Thursday and brought beautiful displays of the northern lights to dark skies farther south than normal. The timing of the storm provided a great show for Europe, but those … [+5246 chars]
